item.title: Ariana Grande & Justin Bieber - Stuck with U - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Stuck with U by Ariana Grande & Justin Bieber from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: B7, Bm, C, Cm, D, Em, G.
